short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate your shareable assignment submission link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension help you get the review link for your submitted peer graded assignment.

How to use:
Go to your assignment link and click on the extension and click on get link button, then wait for 2 seconds and you will get the link. 

Share it with your peers and get your assignments reviewed with ease.
